word_mean: 长压定，敏乐定：C9H15N5O，强力长效口服血管扩张药，主要作用于小动脉，用作抗高血压药

sentence.Network_en: Objective To study the effect of minoxidil on the hypertrophic scar derived fibroblasts.
sentence.Network_cn: 目的探讨米诺地尔对增生性瘢痕成纤维细胞增殖和细胞结构的影响.

sentence.Network_en: HPLC method was established for the determination of minoxidil in compound Sangshen minoxidil liniment.
sentence.Network_cn: 建立了高效液相色谱法测定复方桑参米诺地尔搽剂中米诺地尔的含量.

sentence.Network_en: Minoxidil is the most potent of the drugs that lower pressure by dilating the peripheral arteries.
sentence.Network_cn: 敏乐定是通过扩张周围动脉而降低血压的最强效的药物.

2.长压定（Minoxidil ）　为血管扩张剂，适用于顽固性高血压。该药不影响肾血流量和肾小球过滤率，可用于肾功能不全者。

list.abs: 化学品供应信息列表 ... 托拉塞米 Torasemide 敏乐啶硫酸盐 Minoxidil Sulfate 盐酸倍他洛尔 Betaxolol Hydrochloride.

means.word_mean: 1. a vasodilator (trade name Loniten) used to treat severe hypertension; one side effect is hirsutism so it is also sold (trade name Rogaine) as a treatment for male-patterned baldness
